name: 許進發
objective:
人類從尚未有文字的歷史以來，就有各種不同規模的戰爭，戰爭很吊詭的以你死或我亡，相互毀滅之態勢，爭奪「活著」的條件。古今中外，爆發戰爭的因素或為爭奪領土、權位、或為族群之戰、為意識形態之戰、或為物質資源之爭奪。在視覺影像發達的今日社會，有關戰爭的歷史影像的紀錄片與劇情片數量龐大、並有許多可觀之處。本課程將利用這些描寫戰爭影像資料，帶領同學瞭解相關戰爭與戰役爆發的歷史及其經過。
Throughout human history, even prior to written record, various types of warfare and scales of battles have existed for various purposes of domination or survival by all means of cruelty and destruction. The arousal of violent conflicts might be an attempt at fighting for territorial dominion or material resources economically or altering another species ideologically. In today's modern societies, bountiful documentaries and films concerning historical warfare have been accumulated. This course will aim at giving students a broad understanding and profound knowledge of the causes, process, and effects of significant warfare in human history with the aid of visual images in different media.
